mapper.sql: select GP.GP_ID || '#' || T.LOGICAL_ADDR || '#' || T.PROTOCOL_NO || '#' || GP.GP_SN || '#' as VUE, MP.MP_NAME || '（局号：' || M.ASSET_NO || '）' as NME from C_METER M, C_MP MP, C_GP GP, C_TERMINAL T where M.METER_ID = MP.METER_ID and MP.MP_ID = GP.MP_ID and T.TERM_ID = GP.TERM_ID and GP.GP_TYPE = '2' and GP.OBJECT_ID = #{tgId} order by MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO

select PS.PS_ID || '#' || T.LOGICAL_ADDR || '#' || T.PROTOCOL_NO || '#' || GP.GP_ADDR || '#' || GP.PROTOCOL_NO || '#' || GP.PORT || '#' || PS.MODEL_CODE || '#' as VUE, PS.PS_NAME || '（' || GP.GP_ADDR || '）' as NME from C_PS PS, C_GP GP, C_TERMINAL T where PS.GP_ID = GP.GP_ID and T.TERM_ID = GP.TERM_ID and GP.GP_TYPE = '2' and GP.OBJECT_ID = #{tgId} order by PS.PS_NAME, GP.GP_ADDR

select GP.GP_ID || '#' || T.LOGICAL_ADDR || '#' || T.PROTOCOL_NO || '#' || GP.GP_SN || '#' as VUE, GP.GP_SN as NME from C_GP GP, C_TERMINAL T where T.TERM_ID = GP.TERM_ID and GP.GP_CHAR = '8' and GP.GP_TYPE = '2' and GP.OBJECT_ID = #{tgId} order by T.LOGICAL_ADDR, GP.GP_SN
